biotools.summary:
Practical Haplotype Graph (PHG) facilitates genome-wide imputation and cost-effective genomic prediction.

Successful management and utilization of increasingly large genomic datasets are essential for breeding programs to increase genetic gain and accelerate cultivar development. To help with data management and storage, a sorghum Practical Haplotype Graph (PHG) pangenome database stores all identified haplotypes and variant information for a given set of individuals.
